title: 我的世界1.7.10U端 bat怎么写
author: q1970067798
txt_content: 我的世界1.7.10U端 bat怎么写

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
@echo OFF
:head
set a=-1
:start
set /a a+=1
set b=3
color 7
title Server [已重新启动 %a% 次] 
java -Xmx最大内存G -Xms最小内存G -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions -XX:MaxGCPauseMillis=100 -XX:+DisableExplicitGC -XX:TargetSurvivorRatio=90 -XX:G1MaxNewSizePercent=60 -XX:G1NewSizePercent=40 -XX:G1MixedGCLiveThresholdPercent=35 -XX:+AlwaysPreTouch -XX:+ParallelRefProcEnabled -Dusing.aikars.flags=mcflags.emc.gs -XX:+UseLargePagesInMetaspace -jar 核心名.jar
ping -n %b% 127.1>nul
goto start复制代码

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
q1970067798 发表于 2020-2-28 17:50
这么长吗
你也可以直接
java -jar 核心名.jar

replies.author: BlackMax
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 BlackMax 于 2020-2-28 18:24 编辑 
@echo off
title CatServer-1.12.2
:start
java -server -Xincgc -Xmx2048M -Xms1024M -XX:+AggressiveOpts -XX:+UseCompressedOops -XX:+UseCMSCompactAtFullCollection -XX:+UseFastAccessorMethods -XX:ParallelGCThreads=4 -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:CMSFullGCsBeforeCompaction=2 -XX:CMSInitiatingOccupancyFraction=70 -XX:-DisableExplicitGC -XX:TargetSurvivorRatio=90 -jar CatServer-62d0b60-universal.jar
echo 10秒后重启服务器,如需关闭服务器请直接关闭该窗口
@ping 127.0.0.1 -n 10 >nul
goto start
pause复制代码理论全版本通用
